Segment.name: RC
Segment.comment: To specify the specific part responsible for a customer complaint in a request for service of a product and/or to describe the particular failure mechanism in a failing part or assembly

Field.name: ProductServiceIdQualifier
Field.comment: Code identifying the type/source of the descriptive number used in Product/Service ID (234)

Field.name: ProductServiceId
Field.comment: Identifying number for a product or service

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: CausalPartConditionCode
Field.comment: Code describing the condition of the part or assembly that is the root cause of the problem being reported or repaired

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: YesNoConditionOrResponseCode
Field.comment: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
